column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////- Premium Tonkotsu White ($11.95): The flavor of the Chicken and Pork Broth really had a punch in this one
column2: it literally dived into my mouth with every sip. Their Pork Chashu was very tender and packed with a mild
column3: salty sweet flavor. The green onions
column5: and fried onions was well made with the Ramen
column6: only exception was the wood ears which were really rough to chew on. Last issue I'd like to mention is that the broth I had was a lot saltier than what I would've preferred.
